text.data: Matelite: [character][0x1]...[end]
Sendak: And a Holy Dragon, just as I thought...[end]
Taicho: So that is Emperor Sauzer...[end]
Rush: That's... Palpaleos![end]
Matelite: Hey, wait a minute.[end]
Lukia: We might not be able to beat them...[end]
Matelite: Why, are you giving up?![end]
Matelite: Retreat?! Even if we have to put our lives at risk it is our duty to rescue [character][0x1]![end]
Matelite: Sendak, aren't you going to say anything?[end]
Sendak: ...I have nothing to say.[end]
Sendak: I was just thinking...[end]
Sendak: On that day, the final day of Kahna... Why did Sauzer take the princess with him? And just now, he's brought her to a Holy Dragon... what for?[end]

Truce: I think I know...
[character][0x1] is the daughter of King Kahna. She holds the same power as he did...[end]
Rush: [character][0x1] can speak with the Holy Dragons too![end]
Sendak: I believe that is the case...[end]
Sendak: Sauzer must want that power for himself...[end]
Matelite: That's okay![end]
Matelite: Sendak, you don't need to worry! Because the princess is going back with us! It doesn't matter what Sauzer is planning![end]
Sendak: [character][0x0]...[end]
[character][0x1]: General Palpaleos...[end]
Matelite: Okay, let's go... I don't want to hear any more of Sendak's ramblings...[end]
How rude... Saying nothing but, [0x24]Follow me![0x22][end]
Rush: The others have gone ahead of us![end]
Truce: It's dangerous all by myself![end]
Matelite: Ergh... We can't do anything with [character][0x1] as a hostage...[end]
Sauzer: What was that? Are you insinuating I'm holding the princess hostage?[end]
Sauzer: Princess [character][0x1] is a very important person to us. That you would think we're using her as a hostage...[end]
Sauzer: Hmph... I shall forgive your rude comments. I have no time to be playing with you.[end]
Sauzer: Bring Princess [character][0x1] here.[end]

Sauzer: Now then, Princess [character][0x1].
How about you show me this power of Kahna's royal family as told of in the legend? Show me your miraculous power of controlling the Holy Dragons with your will![end]
[character][0x1]: I don't know about any legend. How many times do I have to say it...?[end]
Palpaleos: Princess [character][0x1], you mustn't be afraid. Didn't you promise us? Please tell us what the Holy Dragon is thinking.[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]! Don't! You mustn't forget the noble spirit of Kahna's royal family![end]
[character][0x1]: Matelite...[end]

[character][0x1]: Emperor Sauzer... No.
I...[end]
Sauzer: I see... You're saying you can't...[end]

Sauzer: I guess there's nothing I can do.
Ever since I made you a part of my kingdom I've had to constantly put up with you.[end]
Sauzer: But that ends today. I can still become the man of legend even without your power![end]
Sauzer: I'm through with you. You may go back to your friends.[end]
What a pity that we won't be able to watch the door to a new era open together! Such a shame![end]
Palpaleos: Wait![end]
Sendak: The princess...[end]
Sendak: You do not understand...[end]

Sendak: I'm talking about what Sauzer desires. He wants to speak to the Holy Dragons with the princess's power. And then what? Sauzer, the Emperor of Granbelos. Sauzer, the Ruler of Orelus. What more could he want?[end]
Matelite: Sendak! Bring medicine! We're hurt![end]
[character][0x0]... I have to go. I wanted to talk more.[end]
Taicho: Sir Matelite! Get up![end]
Lukia: [character][0x0], hurry![end]
Lukia: [character][0x0]! What should we oo![end]
Matelite: [character][0x0]... waid...[end][end]
